name: Jank Cube VR (itch)
description:
HotMK will be the sum of its parts, a plethora of Test Chambers, create by CyberSnake Ind. 
Test Chamber 01: Jank Cube VR 
Its CyberSnakes first VR game, they might be able to throw a human conscience into a game but hell if they can do the game part right.

Lore aside, Jank Cube VR is a small, fun (in my opinion), janky cube stacker for your VR d̶i̶s̶p̶l̶e̶a̶s̶u̶r̶e̶  enjoyment. I have set a price because I would LOVE to continue making Test Chambers but I lack the resources to do the endgame, HotMK which will be a physics, story driven game. No story spoilers here heh.

Consider this more of a donation, the game is intentionally easy to abuse the physics engine.
LET ME MAKE A DISCLAIMER, THIS HAS NO AFFILIATION AT ALL WITH Stress Level Zero's Hall Of The Machine King, I like their work and of course it was inspiration to *attempt* making my own game, but this has nothing to do with them or their work.
